name: Space In Time!
description: How To Play! 1.Use Arrow Keys To Move 2.Hold The Left Mouse Button To Shoot 3.Hold The Right Mouse Button To Get The Spacetime Effect But It Will Take Power Away  4.If You Get Hit By An Enemy You Lose A Life When Your At 0 Life's You Lose                                                                       5.If You Have 0 Power You Also Lose                                              Here's How I Made The Game:
